childMarkdownRemark.rawMarkdownBody: Aaron Meese is a seasoned cybersecurity professional with a history of industry contributions. He has published open-source cyber threat hunting work to help network defenders on [VirusTotal](https://www.virustotal.com/gui/user/ajmeese7/collections), [OTX](https://otx.alienvault.com/user/ajmeese7/pulses), [Abuse IPDB](https://www.abuseipdb.com/user/100336), and more. With a long-standing history of open-source contributions on [GitHub](https://github.com/ajmeese7), development is more than just a career to him; it's a passion. Whether you're looking to set up a network, conduct a penetration test, or develop custom cyber tooling, he's your guy.
